phrs.translation: 批准, 矫正, 认可, 核准
批准条约, 批准条约英语, 翻译

sentences.sentence: Greek lawmakers have yet to ratify the terms—which include more spending cuts, tax hikes and theprivatization of government assets.
sentences.translation: 希腊立法者还没有批准这些条款，其中包括更多的削减开支，增加税收和政府资产私有化。

sentences.sentence: The parliaments of Australia and Indonesia have yet to ratify the treaty.
sentences.translation: 澳大利亚和印度尼西亚议会还未批准该条约。

sentences.sentence: We will work to ratify and bring into force the test ban treaty.
sentences.translation: 我们将为使《禁止核试验条约》获得批准并生效而努力。
